parameters.name: MatchType
Name
parameters.description: The name of the load balancer, which can be used to query by name.

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description: The sorting field. Currently, only sorting by id is supported. 'id' indicates ascending order by id, and '-id' indicates descending order by id. The id size is positively correlated with the creation time. If not provided, it defaults to descending order by id.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number for paginated queries.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The page size for paginated queries, with a value range of 1-500.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~ListSites~~) API.
